snippet: Dr. Raed Arafat returned to his post at the Romanian Health Ministry after protesters in the streets supported him.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Dr Raed Arafat, Romanian Health Ministry official, who is one of the founders of the country's widely lauded emergency-response system; thousands of Romanians held public demonstrations when Arafat resigned from his post, leading to his reinstatement.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Raed Arafat returned to his post at the Romanian Health Ministry after protesters in the streets supported him.

headline.seo: Palestinian Helps Romania Remake Its Emergency Care System
headline.main: Taking Care of His Adopted Country, One Emergency at a Time
headline.print_headline: Taking Care of His Adopted Country, One Emergency at a Time
